responses.rationale: Factual description of risk frequency ('rare') and possibility ('can occur') without explicit framing cues.
Factual reporting of statistics and lack of record without explicit framing cues.
Factual report of deaths and quantity without explicit framing cues.
Factual report of planned action and quantity without explicit framing cues.
Factual report of action taken without explicit framing cues.
Factual report of virus confirmation and location. 'deadly' describes background condition, ignored.
Factual presentation of advice and conditions to report without explicit framing cues.
Contains explicit low-risk framing ('risk... is very low') which is a Reassuring cue (Q5).
Contains explicit food safety assurance ('does not present a food safety risk') which is a Reassuring cue (Q5).
Factual reporting of strain, relation to past event, and statistics without explicit framing cues.
